title: Oktoberfests in Japan
text:
Published: October 13, 2015 
YOKOHAMA OKTOBERFEST FEST 2015: Oct. 2-18, noon-9:30 p.m., 11 a.m.-9:30 p.m. on weekends; taste German beers ad enjoy live music from Germany at Yokohama Red Brick Warehouse, six-minute walk from Bashamichi Station on Minato Mirai or 15-minute walk from JR Sakuragicho and Kan-nai Stations; 300 yen; 045-227-2002. 
BIWAKO HOTEL OKTOBERFEST FEST 2015 (Shiga prefecture): Oct. 14, 6:30-9 p.m.; enjoy all-you-can drink German beers and buffet dinner along with live music performance; free shuttle bus available from JR Ohtsu Station on Biwako Line; 7,500 yen (reservation required), 7,000 yen for advance ticket purchased by Sept. 14; 077-524-1511. 
FUKUOKA OKTOBERFEST FEST 2015 (Fukuoka prefecture): Oct. 16-25, 4-10 p.m., 11 a.m.-10 p.m. weekends; taste 50 varieties of German beers and enjoy live music from Germany at Reizei Koen Special Site, three-minute walk from Nakasu Kawabata Station on Metro Kuko Line; free admission; 080-4695-3572. Join the conversation and share your voice.
